data.prayer: Lord, there are 24,380 people in the state of Hatillo who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hatillo, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Hatillo, Puerto Rico that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Hatillo, Puerto Rico.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
There are 39,300 people living in the state of Hatillo. Only about 12,778 might be believers.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Hatillo. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Rafael Capo
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Rafael Capo, Hatillo, Puerto Rico.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Hatillo that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Hatillo, Puerto Rico to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Hatillo, Puerto Rico need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Hatillo
location.cities_list: Carrizales, Rafael Gonzalez, Rafael Capo, Corcovado
location.cities_list_w_pop: Carrizales (2,556), Rafael Gonzalez (2,325), Rafael Capo (1,863), Corcovado (1,527)
